algorithm_technique: Sort tokens, then use a two-pointer approach: play smallest tokens face-up to gain score, and largest tokens face-down to gain power when needed.
problem_summary_simple: Maximize score by playing tokens face-up (cost power, gain score) or face-down (cost score, gain power).
problem_summary_technical: Sort tokens and use a two-pointer greedy strategy: play smallest tokens face-up if possible, otherwise play largest face-down if score > 0.
key_insights: Sorting the tokens is crucial for the greedy strategy to work effectively.
The greedy choice is to play the smallest token face-up to maximize the chance of gaining more score later.
If unable to play face-up, playing the largest token face-down is optimal to regain power for future face-up plays.
